item.title: BREAKING BAD: ICU Snooker & Pool 2012-13
item.author: Max Chalmers,
item.description: The 2012⁄13 season for ICU Snooker and Pool, which brought about the big name change from ICU Snooker, sparked to life with our annual fun-filled Freshers’ Pool Party at Rileys Victoria. Many new stars burst onto the scene including the ‘Shermanator’ (aka Yi Xuan Zhang), for his ambidextrous …
